oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Central Asian documents : manuscript, 1558-1804
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Various dates (966-1219 [1558-1804]). Addressed to various local rulers in Yarkand and Kashgar.
Documents written in Yarkand, Kashgar and Samarqand. Some (all?) of the documents appear to be later copies of the original documents.
MS Turk 70. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
Twelve documents in Chagatai ; one in Persian.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Asia, Central--History
Xinjiang Uygur Zizhiqu (China)--History
Kashi (China)--History
Yarkand (China)--History
